name: cni-ss-qt1
label: CNI: SS qT1 mapping
description: T1 fitting tool for data acquired with the slice-shuffled SMS IR-EPI sequence from CNI.

nifti_pe1.description: Input NIFTI file with reverse phase encoding

TI.description: Shortest TI of the slice-shuffled scan in ms

TR.description: TR of the slice-shuffled scan in ms

calibration_cycle.description: Number of calibration cycles at the beginning of data acquisition

calibration_volume.description: Number of calibration volumes at the beginning of the NIFTI file

mask_threshold.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); smaller values give larger brain outline estimates

multiband_factor.description: Multiband factor of the slice-shuffled scan

topup_method.description: Algorithm used for applytopup. 'jac' for Jacobian, 'lsr' for least-square resampling

author: Hua Wu, Bob Dougherty
